title: Stool Sample
content:
Not that we really need yet another humanist sans (although this was a custom job, so maybe it's OK), but Underware's recent Stool has some nice features, like an italic with serifs! And the presentation is great (no surprise).   
   
 [http://www.underware.nl/site/customfonts/stool/index.php3](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019061345/http:/www.underware.nl/site/customfonts/stool/index.php3)   
   
hhp
author: hrant

comments.content: ignore the question marks above (don't know why they appeared). stool is fabuloso. lower case "g" and upper case italic "K" are super.
great link. I wish it ws for sale. I could really see using that in several different applications..
Hmmm... yummy. These guys really are on the ball.
I like the way the small caps are taller than the x-height.

When they're not a bit taller, they suck.   
One of the _very_ few things I dislike about Proforma, BTW.   
   
hhp
Not all are. Minion's small caps are exactly the same height as the s-height. It looks rather odd, somewhat too cute.
